title: Accessibility problems
description: I need to first click on one of the "live" areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame). When I launch the Help view on 20020326 Win2K, the tab key does not actually do anything.
OB: When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not have any effect.
EB: When I launch the Help view, the tab key should allow me to navigate through the elements on the page.
SR:
1. Open the Help view.
2. Press the tab key.
